roleset.name: substitute
roleset.note: REPLACE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls exchange-13.6. (from replace.01-v)
REPLACEMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on replace-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls exchange-13.6. (from replacement.01-n)
REPLACED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from replaced.01-j)

example.name: all args
example.text: To profit from an index-arbitrage opportunity, someone who owns the S& P 500 widget in New York must sell it and replace it with a cheaper S & P 500 widget in Chicago.
example.arg: To profit from an index-arbitrage opportunity
someone who owns the S& P 500 widget in New York
with a cheaper S& P 500 widget in Chicago

example.name: new thing in subject position
example.text: Mr. Steinberg, he suggested, could replace British Airways PLC, which has withdrawn from the buy-out group.
example.arg: British Airways PLC, which has withdrawn from the buy-out group

example.name: no new thing
example.text: Continental Air replaced its top executive for the sixth time in as many years.
example.arg: for the sixth time in as many years

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: its replacement by a Western-style Socialist Party

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Nearly one third of those surveyed had surgery at least once since retiring , mostly on knees with knee replacement a common option .

example.name: all args
example.text: More recently, he has been widely protested for his replacement of reimbursement for transportation and healthcare costs by cash
example.arg: of reimbursement for transportation and healthcare costs
